content.question: Which of the following is equal to the change in internal energy of the gas as it is brought from State <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> to State <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 times P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 15 over 2, end fraction, times P sub 0, end sub, times V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times P sub 0, end sub, V sub 0, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times P sub 0, end sub, V sub 0, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
